museums.name: National Museum
museums.description: The National Museum is one of the largest museums in India, featuring collections of artifacts dating back to the Indus Valley Civilization.

museums.name: National Rail Museum
museums.description: The National Rail Museum showcases the rich heritage of Indian Railways with a display of locomotives and carriages.

museums.name: Nehru Planetarium
museums.description: Nehru Planetarium is a center for astronomical education and is popular among students and space enthusiasts.

museums.name: Gandhi Smriti
museums.description: Gandhi Smriti is a museum dedicated to Mahatma Gandhi, showcasing his life and teachings.

museums.name: Indira Gandhi Memorial Museum
museums.description: This museum is housed in the former residence of Indira Gandhi and features exhibits on her life and political career.

museums.name: Crafts Museum
museums.description: The Crafts Museum in Delhi showcases India's rich tradition of handicrafts, textiles, and folk art.

museums.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya
museums.description: CSMVS is a premier art and history museum in Mumbai, showcasing a wide range of artifacts, paintings, and sculptures.

museums.name: Prince of Wales Museum
museums.description: Also known as the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Museum, this museum is renowned for its collection of ancient and medieval artifacts.

museums.name: Dr. Bhau Daji Lad Museum
museums.description: Dr. Bhau Daji Lad Museum in Mumbai is known for its collection of decorative arts and cultural artifacts.

museums.name: National Gallery of Modern Art
museums.description: NGMA in Mumbai showcases contemporary and modern art from Indian and international artists.

museums.name: Raja Dinkar Kelkar Museum
museums.description: This museum in Pune is dedicated to the collection of Raja Dinkar Kelkar, featuring everyday artifacts, sculptures, and decorative arts.

museums.name: Tribal Museum
museums.description: The Tribal Museum in Pune displays the cultural heritage and artifacts of Maharashtra's tribal communities.

museums.name: Albert Hall Museum
museums.description: Albert Hall Museum in Jaipur is the oldest museum in Rajasthan, showcasing a rich collection of artifacts, paintings, and sculptures.

museums.name: City Palace Museum
museums.description: The museum inside Jaipur's City Palace houses a collection of royal artifacts, including costumes, textiles, and weapons.

museums.name: Bagore ki Haveli Museum
museums.description: Bagore ki Haveli in Udaipur is a 18th-century haveli turned museum that displays costumes and modern art.

museums.name: Jantar Mantar
museums.description: Jantar Mantar in Jaipur is a collection of 19 architectural astronomical instruments built by Sawai Jai Singh II, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

museums.name: Anokhi Museum of Hand Printing
museums.description: This museum in Jaipur is dedicated to the traditional art of hand block printing, showcasing exhibits and live demonstrations.

museums.name: Maharana Pratap Museum
museums.description: This museum in Haldighati is dedicated to the life and legacy of Maharana Pratap, a prominent ruler of Mewar.

museums.name: Salar Jung Museum
museums.description: Salar Jung Museum in Hyderabad (though often associated with UP due to the historical connection) features one of the largest collections of art and antiques.

museums.name: State Museum Lucknow
museums.description: The State Museum in Lucknow showcases artifacts from the region’s rich cultural and historical heritage.

museums.name: Ram Katha Sangrahalay
museums.description: Ram Katha Sangrahalay in Ayodhya is dedicated to the epic Ramayana, featuring exhibits that depict the life and story of Lord Rama.

museums.name: Allahabad Museum
museums.description: Allahabad Museum in Prayagraj houses an impressive collection of historical artifacts, including sculptures, coins, and manuscripts.

museums.name: Mathura Museum
museums.description: The Mathura Museum is renowned for its collection of ancient Buddhist and Jain sculptures, along with a variety of other artifacts.

museums.name: Baba Raghav Das Museum
museums.description: Located in Gorakhpur, this museum features exhibits related to the history and culture of the region.

museums.name: Punjab State Museum
museums.description: The Punjab State Museum in Chandigarh features a collection of art, archeological finds, and historical artifacts.

museums.name: Maharaja Ranjit Singh Museum
museums.description: Located in Amritsar, this museum is dedicated to the life and legacy of Maharaja Ranjit Singh, the founder of the Sikh Empire.

museums.name: Punjab State War Heroes' Memorial & Museum
museums.alt: Punjab State War Heroes' Memorial & Museum
museums.description: This museum in Amritsar honors the soldiers of Punjab who sacrificed their lives for the nation.

museums.name: Virasat-e-Khalsa
museums.description: Located in Anandpur Sahib, this museum celebrates the history and culture of Sikhism.

museums.name: Shaheed Bhagat Singh Museum
museums.description: Situated in Khatkar Kalan, this museum is dedicated to the life and legacy of freedom fighter Bhagat Singh.

museums.name: Punjab Agricultural University Museum
museums.description: Located in Ludhiana, this museum showcases Punjab's agricultural history and heritage.

museums.name: Assam State Museum
museums.description: The Assam State Museum in Guwahati is one of the oldest museums in Northeast India, showcasing artifacts and exhibits related to Assam's history, culture, and heritage.

museums.name: Srimanta Sankardev Kalakshetra
museums.description: Srimanta Sankardev Kalakshetra in Guwahati is a cultural institution that celebrates Assamese art, culture, and heritage.

museums.name: Tezpur Museum
museums.description: Tezpur Museum is a small museum that showcases artifacts and history related to the Tezpur region.

museums.name: Bishnu Rabha Smriti Museum
museums.description: This museum is dedicated to Bishnu Prasad Rabha, an Assamese cultural icon, and features his works and contributions.

museums.name: Dibrugarh University Museum
museums.description: Located on the campus of Dibrugarh University, this museum exhibits cultural and historical artifacts from the region.

museums.name: Assam Rajyik State Museum
museums.description: Situated in Guwahati, the Assam Rajyik State Museum is known for its diverse collection of sculptures, tribal artifacts, and ethnographic exhibits.
